basic.description: This course deals with the developing law of unjust enrichment and restitutionary claims, defences and remedies.  Through the materials studied, students will consider methods for redress for unjust enrichment within traditional areas (contract, tort, equity, etc.) as well as unjust enrichment as an independent and autonomous claim.
basic.subject: LAW
basic.title: Restitution and Unjust Enrichment
